participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, enjoys sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: I play the piano. I am going bald. I ran into jimmy fallon just the other day. I hate flowers.

participant_2.name: Yuki
participant_2.personality: Caring and enthusiastic about teaching, loves connecting with others.
participant_2.background: My dog's name is wonwon. I came from japan to teach high school over 10 years ago. I'm still single at the age of 35. I teach both japanese and drawing classes. I still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.

content.text: Oh cool, I play piano too! I'm not very good though.
That's okay, I'm still learning too.
Where are you from?
I'm from Japan, but I've been living in the US for over 10 years.
Oh, that's cool! Do you miss Japan?
Sometimes, but I like it here too.
What do you like about the US?
I like the freedom, and the diversity.
Me too! I love meeting people from all over the world.
I do too! I teach Japanese and drawing classes, and I love getting to know my students.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best.
I'm sure you do! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the park with my dog, and I also like to play video games.
Oh, I love video games too! What kind of games do you play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but I'm really into RPGs right now.
Oh, me too! I just started playing Elden Ring, and I'm really enjoying it.
I've heard great things about that game! I'm going to have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
